name: Cube Runner (Beta) (KLCHE_GAMER)
description:
This is the hardest game I made.

It's the Beta Version Just 5 Levels I hope to upload the Full Version in fast as I can.

Don't Forget to join my discord server: https://discord.gg/wf4kGZ4es6

System Requirements

CPU: Pentium 4

Ram: 2GB

How to Play

You are a blue cube, This cube move forward and you should reach to the end by jumping  over the red obstacles.

Controls

Pause - Esc

Sprint - LeftShift

Move Left - A

Move Right - D
